## âœ… Status
All components of the Notification module Go service layer are implemented.
- Providers: [pkg/notification/providers](pkg/notification/providers)
- Templates: [pkg/notification/templates](pkg/notification/templates)
- Delivery: [pkg/notification/delivery](pkg/notification/delivery)
- gRPC services: [pkg/notification/grpc/notification_service.go](pkg/notification/grpc/notification_service.go), [pkg/notification/grpc/admin_service.go](pkg/notification/grpc/admin_service.go)
- Channel management: [pkg/notification/channels](pkg/notification/channels)
No TODOs or skeletons remain.
